trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= radio>" name="<input type= radio>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Tillater programmatisk tilgang til HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= radio>" name="<input type= radio>" href=""> </xref> element på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlInputRadioButton control to create a radio button on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HtmlInputRadioButton kontrollen til å opprette en alternativknapp på en webside.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputRadioButton control does not provide built-in functionality to display a caption for the radio button.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen HtmlInputRadioButton inneholder ingen innebygde funksjoner for å vise en tittel for alternativet.

trans-unit.source: To create a caption, use literal text in the Web page at the desired location.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en tekst, Bruk litteral websiden på ønsket plassering.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to determine where the caption is displayed relative to the radio button.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan du bestemme der teksten som skal vises i forhold til alternativet.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display the caption on the right side of the radio button, declare an HtmlInputRadioButton control, followed by the caption text, as shown in the following code.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du vil vise teksten på høyre side av alternativet, deklarere en kontroll som HtmlInputRadioButton, etterfulgt av tittelteksten, som vist i følgende kode.

trans-unit.source:
``` Caption Text
``` You can optionally associate a quantity with the HtmlInputRadioButton control by setting the property.
trans-unit.target:
``` Caption Text
```Du kan eventuelt knytte et antall til HtmlInputRadioButton-kontroll ved å angi den egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you have multiple radio buttons and need to perform a calculation, based on the selection.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du har flere alternativknapper og må utføre en beregning, avhengig av hva.

trans-unit.source: HtmlInputRadioButton controls can be grouped together by specifying a common value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Name%2A> property of each radio button you want to include in the group.
trans-unit.target: HtmlInputRadioButton kontroller kan grupperes ved å angi en felles verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Name%2A>for hver alternativknapp du vil inkludere i gruppen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you group HtmlInputRadioButton controls together, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du gruppere HtmlInputRadioButton kontroller, bare én alternativknapp i gruppen kan velge om gangen.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the HtmlInputRadioButton control is selected, test the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å fastslå om kontrollen HtmlInputRadioButton velges, kan du teste det <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have a group of HtmlInputRadioButton controls, you must iterate through the controls and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A> property of each control individually.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har en gruppe HtmlInputRadioButton kontroller, må du gå gjennom kontrollene og test av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>for hver kontrollere enkeltvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HtmlInputRadioButton control provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange> event that is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A> property changes values between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: HtmlInputRadioButton-kontrollen gir en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange>hendelse som aktiveres når det <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>egenskapen endres verdier mellom legges til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions when the event is raised, such as data validation.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg opprette en egendefinert hendelsesbehandling som utfører et bestemt sett med instruksjoner når hendelsen aktiveres, for eksempel datavalideringen.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlInputRadioButton, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av HtmlInputRadioButton, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "radio" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| "Panel" strenglitteral. |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollen er valgt.

trans-unit.source: Use the Checked property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen avmerkede til å bestemme om den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontrollen velges.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: If you have a group of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> controls, you must iterate through the controls and test the Checked property of each control individually.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har en gruppe <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontroller, må du gå gjennom kontrollene og test egenskapen avmerkede for hver kontrollere enkeltvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically specify whether the control is selected.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å angi programmatisk om kontrollen er valgt.

trans-unit.source: You can group <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> controls together by specifying a common value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Name%2A> property of each radio button control you want to include in the group.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gruppere <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>Kontroller sammen ved å angi en felles verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Name%2A>for hver panel for knappekontrollen du vil inkludere i gruppen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you group <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> controls, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du grupperer <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontroller, bare én alternativknapp i gruppen kan velges om gangen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The Checked property of the selected control is set to `true`, while the same property is set to `false` for all other radio buttons in the group.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen avmerkede for den valgte kontrollen er satt til `true`, mens den samme egenskapen er satt til `false` for alle andre knappene i gruppen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollen er valgte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Behandler sende tilbake dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method checks to see whether the postback value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadPostData kontrollerer om sende tilbake verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontrollen er forskjellig fra den forrige verdien, og i så fall returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadPostData brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen identifikatoren for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av alle navneverdier som innkommende.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollens tilstanden er endret som et resultat av tilbakesending; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the group that the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> class is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på gruppen som forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> klassen er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: Group multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> controls by specifying a common value for the Name property of each radio button you want to include in the group.
trans-unit.target: Grupperer flere <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>Kontroller ved å angi en felles verdi for egenskapen navn for hver alternativknapp du vil inkludere i gruppen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: When you group <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> controls, only one radio button in the group can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: Når du grupperer <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontroller, bare én alternativknapp i gruppen kan velges om gangen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A> property of the selected control is set to `true`, while the same property is set to `false` for all other radio buttons in the group.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>for den valgte kontrollen er satt til `true`, mens den samme egenskapen er satt til `false` for alle andre knappene i gruppen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The group of check box controls that the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> class is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen i avmerkingsboksen kontrollerer som forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> klassen er medlem av.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event and registers the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control as one that requires postback handling.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelsen og registrerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollen som en som krever sende tilbake behandling.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is called just prior to rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender kalles like før gjengivelse av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg opprette en egendefinert hendelsesbehandling når hendelsen aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control changes values between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange>denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontrollen endrer verdier mellom legges til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions (such as data validation) when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg opprette en egendefinert hendelsesbehandling som utfører et bestemt sett med instruksjoner (for eksempel datavalidering) når hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kontrollen må ha visningsstatus aktivert for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange>hendelsen skal fungere riktig.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.ServerChange>

trans-unit.source: To enable view state for all controls on the Web Forms page, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere visningsstatusen for alle kontroller på siden webskjema, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also enable view state for an individual control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også aktivere visningsstatusen for én enkelt kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnServerChange method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnServerChange kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.OnServerChange*> method to signal the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Kall den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.OnServerChange*>metoden signalisere den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollen tilstanden til kontrollen er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.OnServerChange*>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostDataChangedEvent brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control attributes to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> Kontroller attributtene til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method writes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Value%2A> property as an attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control and then calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method The RenderAttributes method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderAttributes skriver den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Value%2A>egenskapen som et attributt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontrollere og kaller deretter basisklassen <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A>metode for RenderAttributes metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered output.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som mottar gjengitte utdata.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked*>for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollere endringer mellom legges til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: The ServerChange event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control changes value between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: ServerChange denne hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontrollen endringer verdien mellom legges til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions (such as data validation) when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg opprette en egendefinert hendelsesbehandling som utfører et bestemt sett med instruksjoner (for eksempel datavalidering) når hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The control must have view state enabled for the ServerChange event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kontrollen må ha visningsstatus aktivert for hendelsen ServerChange skal fungere riktig.

trans-unit.source: To enable view state for all controls on the Web Forms page, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere visningsstatusen for alle kontroller på siden webskjema, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also enable view state for an individual control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også aktivere visningsstatusen for én enkelt kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.LoadPostData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.LoadPostData*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.LoadPostData*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen identifikatoren for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av alle navneverdier som innkommende

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollens tilstanden er endret som et resultat av tilbakesending; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoden ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Value property to specify or determine the value associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Value-egenskapen til å angi eller bestemme verdien som er knyttet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The value can be any valid string that you want to associate with the control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien kan være en gyldig streng som du vil knytte til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you have multiple radio buttons and need to perform a calculation based on the selection.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du har flere alternativknapper og må utføre en beregning basert på utvalget.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can have radio buttons that represent different shipping methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel ha alternativknapper som representerer metoder for loggsending.

trans-unit.source: You can store the shipping cost in the Value property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lagre shipping kostnaden i Value-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: When the user selects the shipping method, the appropriate shipping amount can be determined from this property and added to the sales total.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren velger shipping-metoden, kan det aktuelle loggsending beløpet fastslås fra denne egenskapen og legges til salg.

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputRadioButton"> </xref> kontrollen.
